thread.title: BRIEF-Metropolitan Bank And Trust Receives Board Approval To Conduct A Stock Rights Offer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Metropolitan Bank And Trust Receives Board Approval To Conduct A Stock Rights Offer

organizations.name: brief-metropolitan bank and trust receives board approval to conduct a stock rights offer
reuters) - metropolitan bank and trust co

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Metropolitan Bank And Trust Co:
* METROPOLITAN BANK AND TRUST -RECEIVED BOARD APPROVAL TO CONDUCT A STOCK RIGHTS OFFER BY WAY OF ISSUANCE OF UP TO A MAXIMUM OF 819.8 MILLION COMMON SHARES
* METROPOLITAN BANK AND TRUST -A PORTION OF PROCEEDS WILL BE USED FOR THE ACQUISITION OF THE REMAINING 20% EQUITY STAKE IN METROBANK CARD CORPORATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
